room_title: Escape room "Down The Rabbit Hole" by Amazing Escape Room Bloomfield in New York
review: Came here for an activity to escape the heat. We had so much fun! Matt who was our Game Master was super helpful and the room was really well set up. Definitely will be back to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Down The Rabbit Hole" by Amazing Escape Room Bloomfield in New York
review: Went with my niece and my nephew who simply loved their experience. Will definitely come again to complete the rest of the rooms!
